summary: A portrait of the broken lives of four people (a vigilante detective, a worried parent, an awkward man looking for love and a suicidal artist) as they all struggle to cope in their religiously-dystopian city.
cast: Eva Green|Ryan Phillippe|Sam Riley|Bernard Hill|James Faulkner|Stephen Walters|Art Malik|Susannah York|Richard Coyle|Kika Markham|Helmut Christian Kirchmeier|Hilary Sesta|Matthew Flynn|Janetta Morrow|Doug Allen|Roger Frost|Sam Douglas|Mark Wingett|Dolly Wells|Tim Steed|Ray Perrotte|Dominic Copestick|Nathalie Simmons|Gary Pillai|Georgia Mackenzie|Liz White|Stuart McQuarrie|Billy Geraghty|Shannon Cussens|Audrey Palmer|Jotham Annan|Natasha Jenssen|Vauxhall Jermaine|Georgie Lee-Robinson|Andrew Care|Jay Fuller|Jeanie Gold|Sid Karne|Luke Lynch|Danielle Victoria Sambrook|Allan Williams|Chris Wilson|Evie Wray
keywords: low budget sci fi movie|restaurant|detective|synchronicity|post traumatic stress disorder
title: Franklyn
